sourcesContent:
<select id="enviromentId"
        [(ngModel)]="currentEnviromentId">

    <option selected disabled hidden id="selectEnviromentDefaultOption">Vybrať prostredie...</option>

    <option *ngFor="let item of currentEnviromentsOptions"
            [ngValue]="item.id">
        {{ item.name }}
    </option>

</select>
